title: Calories in a Shot of Tequila
meta_description: Discover calories in a shot of tequila, plus full nutrition breakdown including alcohol content, carbs, and quick tweaks for variations like flavored options.
h1: Calories in a Shot of Tequila
assumptions: Standard 1.5 oz (44 ml) shot of 80-proof (40% ABV) silver tequila, no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, and serving size; flavored tequilas may add sugars. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard shot of 80-proof tequila contains ~97 kcal, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of tequila?
faqs.a: About 97 kcal for a standard 1.5 oz shot of 80-proof tequila.

faqs.q: Does tequila have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Pure tequila has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars; calories come solely from alcohol.

faqs.q: What affects calories in tequila shots?
faqs.a: Proof (higher ABV increases calories), serving size, and additives like flavors or mixers.

faqs.q: Is tequila lower calorie than other spirits?
faqs.a: Similar to vodka or gin at same proof—around 97 kcal per shot—without added carbs.

faqs.q: How much alcohol in a shot of tequila?
faqs.a: A 1.5 oz shot of 80-proof tequila contains about 14 g of pure alcohol.
